home.heroSubtitle: Discover our collection of handcrafted candles and notebooks, made to bring warmth and joy to your everyday moments.
home.madeWithLoveText: Every candle is hand-poured and every notebook is carefully bound by hand. We believe in creating products that bring joy and comfort to your daily life. Our small-batch approach ensures quality and attention to detail in every piece.
home.review1Text: The candles smell absolutely divine! Best purchase ever.
home.review2Text: Beautiful notebooks, perfect quality. I love them!
home.review3Text: Such cute packaging and amazing scents. Highly recommend!

product.freeShippingText: On orders over $50. Usually ships within 1-2 business days.

footer.tagline: Handcrafted candles & notebooks made with love

about.title: About PookieCrafts
about.subtitle: Handcrafted with love, designed to bring warmth and joy to your everyday moments.
about.howItStartedText1: PookieCrafts was born from a simple love for creating beautiful, meaningful things by hand. What started as a hobby in a small home studio has blossomed into a passion for crafting products that bring comfort and joy to people's lives.
about.howItStartedText2: Every candle is hand-poured with care, using only natural soy wax and premium fragrance oils. Each notebook is thoughtfully bound, with attention to every detail. We believe that handmade items carry a special warmth that mass-produced products simply can't match.
about.handmadeQualityText: Every product is crafted by hand in small batches to ensure the highest quality.
about.naturalMaterialsText: We use eco-friendly, sustainable materials whenever possible.
about.madeWithLoveText: Each item is created with care and attention to detail.
about.joinCommunityText: We're so grateful to have a wonderful community of customers who appreciate handmade quality and thoughtful design. Every order supports a small business and helps us continue doing what we love. Thank you for being part of our journey!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products
faq.q1: How long do the candles burn?
faq.a1: Our candles provide approximately 40-50 hours of burn time, depending on the size. To maximize burn time, always trim the wick to 1/4 inch before lighting and allow the wax to melt to the edge of the container on the first burn.
faq.q2: What are the candles made from?
faq.a2: All our candles are hand-poured using 100% natural soy wax, premium fragrance oils, and cotton wicks. We use eco-friendly, sustainable ingredients that are vegan and cruelty-free.
faq.q3: What paper do you use for notebooks?
faq.a3: Our notebooks feature high-quality, acid-free paper (120gsm) that prevents bleed-through and yellowing over time. Each notebook contains 120 pages of smooth writing paper.
faq.a4: Currently, we ship within the US only. We offer free shipping on orders over $50. Most orders ship within 1-2 business days and arrive within 3-5 business days.
faq.stillQuestionsText: We're here to help! Feel free to reach out to us.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a question or want to chat? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.responseTimeText: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours. For urgent matters, please mention "URGENT" in your subject line.
contact.messageSentText: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon!
